title: Trails Of The Dime Novel
description: Danger and excitement In the late 1800's the imagination of a nation was fueled by the wonder of Dime Novels. Soon the adventures were found in saddlebags and satchels, purses and waiting rooms. Gunfights and showdowns The celebrated authors took real life stories and built them into dramatic tales that fascinated readers, young and old. From the James Gang to the Buffalo Soldiers, the dramas unfolded with every new page. The making of legends Rick Dayton went west to write the beloved stories only to find himself living them instead. Travel across the west with him as every new adventure offers another novel in the journey of a lifetime.
author: Terry W. Burns
